net.objectzoo.delegates

Interface Function3<T1,T2,T3,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    T1 - The type of the Function3's first parameter
    T2 - The type of the Function3's second parameter
    T3 - The type of the Function3's third parameter
    R - The type of the Function3's return value
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Function3AsyncSupport
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Function3<T1,T2,T3,R>
    A Function3 is a reference to a function with return value that can be invoked synchronously similar to a regular Java method call.
    Author:
    tilmann

      Binds the given parameters to the given Function3 returning a new Function0 that acts as an invocation of the Function3 with the given parameters.
      default Function0<R> bindParameters(T1 parameter1, T2 parameter2, T3 parameter3)
      Binds the given parameters to this Function3 returning a new Function0 that acts as an invocation of this Function3 with the given parameters.
      static <T1,T2,T3,R>

      Creates a Function that calls apply(Object, Object, Object) with the given parameters on the consumed Function3s.
      default Action3<T1,T2,T3> toAction()
      Converts this Function3 into an Action3 ignoring the function's return value.
